name: ShowHiddenChannels
author: JustOptimize (Oggetto)
description: A plugin which displays all hidden Channels and allows users to view information about them, this won't allow you to read them (impossible).

changelog.title: v0.6.0 - Dependency Update
items: Switched to BdApi.Net for fetching data.
Stopped using ZeresPluginLibrary to fetch modules
Replaced ZeresPluginLibrary Logger with a custom logger (now the console looks pretty)
Edited the updater to fetch the file from the releases and not from the tags

changelog.title: v0.5.8 - Fix plugin not working after February 17th
items: Fixed plugin not working after Discord update.
Fix settings panel not showing up.
